text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Hmmm……… It's hard to come back, Elle and Glass. Are you okay!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
Yes…… And the other chairman of the board 
is still running the whole time.
Ha, ha…… Ha, ha…… Hmmm, hmmm, hmmm!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: Yeah…… Chairman Symbol Rudolph is…… running and laughing?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: She said the village is burning.…… Macho Man, what happened desu!

The Demon Lord's army has attacked the village larder! I'd like 
to go back to help, but I'm too far away ……!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
No, you can't make it in time, if you are another species. Even 
direwolves and wyverns can't make it in time. But―

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
If you're a horse girl―you'll make it! Elle, 
go. Fantasy battle, it's your debut!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hah!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
She is a horse girl. Their "leg power" is the 
strongest on the Uma Nest continent. They can 
run a thousand miles in an instant! And then…

She's going to ram it? Yeah, shoot an arrow! Poison and 
paralyzing medicine. Paint it on the arrowhead and give it to her!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ugh!

You did it! Kookkook, if you eat even the slightest bit of that 
poison, you'll be able to ……
What?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Along with leg strength, the weapon of the Uma Musume 
is "strong resistance". Poison and paralysis are 
basically impenetrable to the Uma Musume!
Yeah, shoot in rapid fire! Shoot, shoot, shoot the poison arrows!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hirololo…… Ahhhh, glass glass～?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I've already been to…… I mean, a trace amount may be fine, but if 
you eat that much, of course it's going to work, right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Antidote!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Alright, here we go!
Yes, then it's magic. Underfoot, get muddy! Mudfield!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume, Sire Skills! 'Road Badness ◎'!

What? Noooo, in this case, it's the 
last resort. Time-reversal magic!
The Rebirth! The hands of the clock! The reverse!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Is this…… no way back-in-time magic? Skills that can counter this 
kind of thing are indeed ……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
(Still…… never give up is Uma Musume no 
Desu! If the needle turns left ah!)

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: (Uma Musume, Sire Skill! 'Left Turn ◎' ！！！！！！！)
What～! It's resistant to reverse rotation?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Haaaaah! Condor roaring wave!
Geeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now, I'm sorry, Desu! And serve the food you took!

Hmmm, hmmm, hahaha, too bad! All the food has already been taken 
away by the Demon Lord! Just a few minutes ago.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
The Demon Lord herself ……! Then it's up to us 
to chase after them and capture them. No one 
can escape from the legs of the horse girl.

Hmph, it's no use. Still, I can't catch up 
with only the Demon Lord. Because of ……

The Demon Lord is the only race that 
even you cannot catch up with!
What is it? I'm sure you guys can guess.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Even Uma Musume can't keep up? If it's more than a wyvern, it's 
either a divine wolf or a thunder dragon ……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ha, you don't mean ……!

Hmmm, I see you've noticed. Yes, our new Demon Lord can run as 
fast as you. In other words―!

Hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, 
hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm, hmmm!

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text: What! The chairman just spoke! But this voice!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Seed rice! Get the ingredients for porridge from the pantry! Raw 
barley, raw rice, soi soi soi! Bon appétit manticore!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm not Ms. Golshi! That means it's 
not a trial run, just playing ……

text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
text_block_list.text:
And that's not all. ……? Maybe the 
cause of the trouble itself is ……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Chancellor, it's okay, just let it go!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
But if we change the way we deal with the situation now, it will 
be more confusing! So…

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Great decision! Continue as is!
